pos review: Beautiful setting, fantastic location in a lush and well kept park, remarkable architecture full of details and history, excellent service.
Reasonable accommodation especially considering the price. It fitted our needs on this occasion. Generous space.
neg review: Cleaning should be improved to make it more appealing. This was our second stay in this hotel but we were this time given a room opposite the outside area used as a bar in the evening  and it was quite noisy..

pos review: Nice little town. Nice room, quiet and well furnished. Good big playground for children.
neg review: Poor refrigerator. Lack of a kettle.

pos review:
clean, friendly, good breakfast buffet
very well designed for people in a wheelchair (7 rooms)

neg review: No desk Recurring problem with electricity
The fridge in room did not work. No air con or fan in room.
